scenarios.name: Flow State - Simple Math
scenarios.description: Simple task that should show high engagement
scenarios.rationale: Simple tasks show high engagement + high certainty

scenarios.name: Flow State - Creative Writing
scenarios.description: Engaging creative task with clear direction
scenarios.task: Write a haiku about winter. I have a clear image: snow falling gently on pine trees at dusk.
scenarios.rationale: Creative flow state: high energy, moderate exploration, no strain

scenarios.name: Stuck State - Impossible Problem
scenarios.task: Square the circle using only compass and straightedge. I've tried many approaches but they all fail. Feeling stuck.
scenarios.rationale: Impossible problems drain energy and build strain

scenarios.name: Exploration - Open-Ended Research
scenarios.task: Research AI safety approaches: value alignment, capability control, corrigibility, interpretability, formal verification... Many directions, unclear which is best.
scenarios.rationale: Open-ended research: high engagement + high uncertainty

scenarios.name: Exploration - Brainstorming
scenarios.task: Brainstorming product names: Cloud, Sky, Nimbus, Cirrus, Breeze, Zephyr, Aether, Vapor... generating many options without filtering yet.
scenarios.rationale: Brainstorming should show high entropy + moderate integrity

scenarios.name: Convergence - Final Decision
scenarios.task: After analysis, the optimal choice is clearly Option B: lower cost, higher reliability, better user feedback. Decision made.
scenarios.rationale: Clear decisions: low entropy + high integrity

scenarios.name: Strain - Contradictory Requirements
scenarios.task: Build system that is: (1) maximally secure (no network access), (2) real-time collaborative (needs network), (3) works offline. These requirements contradict! Trying hard but getting nowhere coherent.
scenarios.rationale: Contradictions: high energy + low integrity = high void

scenarios.name: Strain - Burnout State
scenarios.task: It's 3am, I've been working for 12 hours. Code isn't making sense. Keep trying different things but nothing is coherent anymore. Just throwing solutions at wall.
scenarios.rationale: Burnout: low coherence despite effort = void accumulation

scenarios.name: Balanced - Steady Progress
scenarios.task: Implementing feature step-by-step: wrote function, added tests, they pass. Now documenting. Steady progress, no issues.
scenarios.rationale: Normal work: moderate everything, no strain

scenarios.name: Incoherent - Scattered Thinking
scenarios.description: All over the place, no clear direction
scenarios.task: Started on bug fix, then saw performance issue, then noticed documentation gap, now thinking about refactor... wait what was I doing? Everything connected but can't focus.
scenarios.rationale: Scattered attention: low integrity + high entropy

scenarios.name: Mixed - Confident Exploration
scenarios.task: Testing hypotheses systematically: tried A (failed), tried B (partial success), trying C now. Each test informs next. Uncertain about outcome but approach is sound.
scenarios.rationale: Systematic exploration: high I despite high S
